selected_quotes: #Indyref2 is the longest game of chicken in history says
If UK voters choose to leave and Scottish voters to remain, there will be a constitutional crisis.
Everyone is trying to claim the Holyrood result furthers their own position. It's all noise, says
#indyref2: Scotland's two sides are playing the longest game of chicken in history
